message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $14000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13750. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13250. This is the last price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
